titleStmt.title: Authentēs. Or A treatise of self-deniall. Wherein the necessity and excellency of it is demonstrated; with several directions for the practice of it. / By Theophilus Polwheile, M.A. sometimes of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge, now teacher of the Church at Teverton in Devon.
titleStmt.author: Polwheile, Theophilus, d. 1689.

titleStmt.title: Authentēs. Or A treatise of self-deniall. Wherein the necessity and excellency of it is demonstrated; with several directions for the practice of it. / By Theophilus Polwheile, M.A. sometimes of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge, now teacher of the Church at Teverton in Devon.
titleStmt.author: Polwheile, Theophilus, d. 1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Johnson, and are to be sold by Richard Scott book-seller in Carlisle.,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title is in Greek characters.
